## DropErc1155ClaimConditions.getClaimerProofs() method

Returns allow list information and merkle proofs for the given address.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getClaimerProofs(tokenId: BigNumberish, claimerAddress: string): Promise<SnapshotEntryWithProof | null>;
```
